Package com.shikharani.onlinelearningplatform.service

Class CommonService

java.lang.Object
com.shikharani.onlinelearningplatform.service.CommonService
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateNewCourseServiceImpl, InstructorServiceImpl, StudentServiceImpl
public class CommonService extends Object
This common service have methods which are used across multiple services. This will get extended by all ServiceImpl.
